Name: Seduction
About the game: 《Seduction》is a 2d horror adventure puzzle game. Lee has to survive in the dark realm and to save her trapped soul from being use for the great summoning. Facing with mysteries, he has to figure out the truth in order to end it. Gameplay Seduction is a 2D horror adventure game that replies on solving puzzles and escaping dangers. Searched for items that are crucial for puzzles while some are well hidden. Escape from great danger and seek to avoid seduction. Features - Seduction is a 2d horror adventure game. - Puzzles and mysteries to solve - Play as a monk and his story - A story-driven adventure - Beautiful environments and settings 'The temptation is always there, temptation is there, learn to refuse, although she always seems irresistible.'
